== Main Inclusion Report for mauve ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/m/mauve]]</nowiki>
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of openjdk-6. Used to run the testsuite during the build.
 0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=mauve|entries]]</nowiki>: None
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=mauve|Secunia history]]</nowiki>: None
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid, no daemons.
** Network activity: Some testcases to test network libraries.
** No source code review performed.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Works out of the box without configuration (contains source code only, which requires a autoconf/configure run).
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:mauve|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: None.
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/mauve|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> is calm.
** <nowiki>[[http://sourceware.org/mauve/|Upstream]]</nowiki> is updating and extending the testsuite regularily.
** No upstream bug tracker.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant.
** Packaging system: debhelper. Patch system: None.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
